best_gem_comment: Genuinely, this class was great! An absolute gem. Erin and Sophie are so supportive and I have learned so much in this class. Not too much work but when there is work, it is so interesting so it's really not that overwhelming.

study for the quizzes. they are only 10 mins and worth 50% of grade. i thought the quizzes were relatively unfairly graded but you can ask for points back if necessary. the rubric for projects was last minute and not always clear but those were graded fairly easy. i think the content is really interesting esp for HEB concentrators but this isn’t a gem
best_gem_comment_short: i think the content is really interesting esp for HEB concentrators but this isn’t a gem
